mapper.sql: id, operation_team_id, member_user_id, status, creator, creation_time
mapper.select: select t.id,t.operation_team_id,t.member_user_id,t.`status`,t.creator,t.creation_time, t1.group_name operationTeamName, t2.`name` memberUserName from operation_team_member t LEFT JOIN operation_team t1 on t1.id = t.operation_team_id LEFT JOIN system_user t2 on t2.id = t.member_user_id WHERE 1=1 and t.operation_team_id = #{operationTeamId}
